item.description:
Come dance in style with the 18-piece Beantown Swing Orchestra in the 7500 sq. ft. Presidential Ballroom at the Hyatt Regency Hotel in Cambridge!

The first set will feature 21-year-old vocalist John Stevens, who finished sixth on American Idol during its third season!

The band plays from 9:30pm to 12:30am, with various swing dance lessons offered from 7:00 to 9:00pm. It's a great way to meet people in and outside of the meetup group.

See http://swingcitybosto... for more details about the event.
item.how_to_find_us: Frank will be on stage conducting the band.

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: "Swingin' At The Hyatt" Swing Dance in Cambridge, Mass.
